Text: I had the pleasure of working with you last year in the PGE and SDGE settlements when I was with United Energy Currently I am with a Company called Stuart Energy Systems Corporation which specializes in the production of hydrogen through electrolysis for zeroemission fuel applications We are in the process of putting together a proposal to fuel a number of hydrogen buses for AC Transit and are looking for a supplier of electricity who can provide green sourced electricity for a fixed period of time The project itself will be very high profile and likely provide an opportunity to input into municipal and state renewable policies I think that there may some synergies which would certainly warrant discussion on this matter Yours truly Brian Dingwall General Counsel Stuart Energy Systems Corporation The West Mall Toronto Ontario MC B Tel ext Fax email
